// iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde kaśyapa-stotravarṇano nāma catuścatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 344 //
rakṣāṃ tu tāṃ me kathaya dvijendra
rakṣā hi sāgryā paramā matā me
rakṣāṃ tu tāṃ me kathaya dvijendra
rakṣā hi sa āgryā paramā matā me
// iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛ[tīye] kha[ṇḍe] mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde bhū-vivara-sthita-rājño rakṣā-varṇano nāma pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 3.345 //
namo 'stu te namo 'stu te namo 'stu te /
namo 'stu te namo 'stu te namo 'stu te /

asuravaradaityadānavayakṣarākṣasabhūtapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍasiddhayoginīḍākinīskandapurogān grahān nakṣatragahāṃś cānyān
hana hana
paca paca
matha matha
vidhvaṃsaya vidhvaṃsaya
vidrāvaya vidrāvaya
śaṅkhena
cakreṇa
vajreṇa
gadayā
musalena
halena
bhasmīkuru /

asura-vara-daitya-dānava-yakṣa-rākṣasa-bhūta-preta-piśāca-kumbhāṇḍa-siddha-yoginī-ḍākinī-skanda-puro-gān grahān nakṣatra-gahāṃś ca anyān

musalena

bhasmī-kuru /

ya imām aparājitāṃ paramavaiṣṇavīṃ siddhāṃ mahāvidyāṃ japati paṭati śṛṇoti smarati dhārayati
kīrtayati vā na tasyāgnivāyuvajropalāśani..(?)[bh]ayam
na samudrabhayam
na grahabhayam
na caurabhayam
śvāpadabhayaṃ vā na bhavet /

ya imām aparājitāṃ parama-vaiṣṇavīṃ siddhāṃ mahā-vidyāṃ japati paṭati śṛṇoti smarati dhārayati
kīrtayati vā na tasya agni-vāyu-vajra-upalāśani..(?)[bh]ayam
na samudra-bhayam
na graha-bhayam
na caura-bhayam
śvāpada-bhayaṃ vā na bhavet /

etair mantrair udāhṛtaiḥ siddhaiḥ saṃsiddhapūjitaiḥ / tad yathā
oṃ namo 'stu te
anaghe /

etair mantrair udāhṛtaiḥ siddhaiḥ saṃsiddha-pūjitaiḥ / tad yathā
oṃ namo 'stu te
anaghe /
sthalagataṃ jalagatam antarikṣagataṃ vā rakṣa rakṣa sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ svāhā /
sthalagataṃ jalagatam antarikṣa-gataṃ vā rakṣa rakṣa sarva-bhūtebhyaḥ sarva-upadravebhyaḥ svāhā /

tad yathā

kālaṃ sara sara
gauri gauri

vidye

māle
gandhe
bandhe
paca paca
vidye
nāśaya vā saṃhara duḥsvapnaṃ vināśaya /

oṃ drauṃdrauṃ jroṃjroṃ kroṃkroṃ
turu turu
yeṣāṃ dviṣanti pratyakṣaṃ paro[']kṣaṃ vā sarvān
dama dama
marda marda
tāpaya tāpaya
gopaya gopaya
utsādaya utsādaya /

oṃ drauṃdrauṃ jroṃjroṃ kroṃkroṃ
turu turu
yeṣāṃ dviṣanti pratyakṣaṃ paro[']kṣaṃ vā sarvān
dama dama
marda marda
tāpaya tāpaya
gopaya gopaya
utsādaya utsādaya /
yathāmanīṣitaṃ kāryaṃ tan mama sidhyatu svāhā /
yathā-manīṣitaṃ kāryaṃ tan mama sidhyatu svāhā /
yatraivā agataṃ pāpaṃ tatraiva pratigacchatu svāhā /
// iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛ[tīye] kha[ṇḍe] mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde garuḍa-stotraṃ nāma ṣāṭcatvāriṃśad-adhika-tri-śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
// iti viṣṇudharmottare tṛtīya-khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde vāsudeva-stotraṃ nāma sapta-catvāriṃśad-adhika-triśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 347 //
// iti viṣṇudharmottare tṛtīya-khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde vasū1pākhyānaṃ nāmā7ṣṭa-catvāriṃśad-adhika-triśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 348 //
// iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīye khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde śrī-nāradasya śvetadvīpa-gamanavarṇano (!) nāmaikonapañcāśadadhitriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 3.349 //
bhakto 'haṃ tvāṃ didṛkṣur ekāntadarśanāyety oṃ namaḥ /
bhakto 'haṃ tvāṃ didṛkṣur ekāntadarśanāya ity oṃ namaḥ /
// iti śrī-viṣṇudharmottare tṛtīya-khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde śvetadvīpe śrīnārada-stotra-varṇano nāma pañcāśad-adhika-triśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
sac ca asac ca aham eva atra
// iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīya-khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde viśvarūpākhyānaṃ nāmaikapañcāśaduttara-triśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 351 //

ādāv eva saraḥsaritprasravaṇasamīpagṛhopavanaparvatamastakānām anyatame hṛdye deśe susamaṃ
manoharaṃ hastamātraṃ maṇḍalakam upakalpayet //

ādāv eva saraḥ-sarit-prasravaṇa-samīpa-gṛhopavana-parvata-mastakānām anyatame hṛdye deśe susamaṃ
mano-haraṃ hasta-mātraṃ maṇḍalakam upakalpayet //
tatra madhye 'ṣṭapatraṃ padmam ālikhet / tatas tūdāhṛtacaturasrayā caturdvāralekhayā vibhajet //
tatra madhye 'ṣṭa-patraṃ padmam ālikhet / tatas tu udāhṛta-catur-asrayā catur-dvāra-lekhayā vibhajet //
tataḥ padmakarṇikāmadhye śvetaṃ śatapatraṃ padmaṃ dhyāyet //
tataḥ padma-karṇikā-madhye śvetaṃ śata-patraṃ padmaṃ dhyāyet //
tatkarṇikopary arkamaṇḍala[ṃ] / tadupari candramaṇḍala[ṃ] / tadupar[y] agnimaṇḍala[ṃ] / tanmadhye paraṃ puruṣam aśarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśam aśabdaṃ sarvagaṃ plutāntaṃ oṃkāraṃ vinyaset //

tat-karṇika-upary arka-maṇḍala[ṃ] / tad-upari candramaṇḍala[ṃ] / tad-upar[y] agni-maṇḍala[ṃ] / tan-madhye paraṃ puruṣam aśarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśam aśabdaṃ sarvagaṃ pluta-antaṃ oṃ-kāraṃ vinyaset //
kamalapūrvadale akāraṃ vāsudevaṃ nyaset / śvetavarṇaṃ dhyāyet //
kamala-pūrva-dale a-kāraṃ vāsudevaṃ nyaset / śveta-varṇaṃ dhyāyet //
dakṣiṇe ākāraṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ vinyaset / padmapatrābhaṃ taṃ ca dhyāyet //
dakṣiṇe ā-kāraṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ vinyaset / padma-patra-ābhaṃ taṃ ca dhyāyet //
paścime dale oṃkār[aṃ] pradyumnaṃ vinyaset / pītavarṇaṃ ca dhyāyet //
paścime dale oṃ-kār[aṃ] pradyumnaṃ vinyaset / pīta-varṇaṃ ca dhyāyet //
uttaradale aḥkāram aniruddhaṃ vinyaset / kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ ca dhyāyet //
uttara-dale aḥ-kāram aniruddhaṃ vinyaset / kṛṣṇa-varṇaṃ ca dhyāyet //
aiśāne dale tad iti brahmāṇaṃ vinyaset / padmapatrābhaṃ dhyāyet // [Vdha_3.352.0.9] //
aiśāne dale tad iti brahmāṇaṃ vinyaset / padma-patra-ābhaṃ dhyāyet // [Vdha_3.352.0.9] //

prapūrvadvāre oṃ keṃ ṭeṃ yeṃ etāny akṣarāṇi vainateyaṃ vinyaset /
hemavarṇaṃ ca dhyāyet //

prapūrva-dvāre oṃ keṃ ṭeṃ yeṃ etāny akṣarāṇi vainateyaṃ vinyaset /
hema-varṇaṃ ca dhyāyet //
dakṣiṇe dvāre tejoratharatṛ(?)cakraṃ sudarśanaṃ vinyaset / vajranābhaṃ sahasrāraṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabhaṃ dhyāyet //
dakṣiṇe dvāre tejo-ratharatṛ(?)-cakraṃ sudarśanaṃ vinyaset / vajra-nābhaṃ sahasra-araṃ sūryakoṭi-sama-prabhaṃ dhyāyet //
sveṃ ṭheṃ heṃ theṃ uttare dvāre aniruddhaṃ nyasyet / sarvavarṇaṃ dhyāyet //
sveṃ ṭheṃ heṃ theṃ uttare dvāre aniruddhaṃ nyasyet / sarva-varṇaṃ dhyāyet //
veṃ ṇeṃ kṣeṃ kṣeṃ vidikṣu pāñcajanyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ nyaset / śaśāṅkavarṇaṃ dhyāyet //
veṃ ṇeṃ kṣeṃ kṣeṃ vidikṣu pāñca-janyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ nyaset / śaśa-aṅka-varṇaṃ dhyāyet //
dheṃ heṃ bheṃ heṃ śriyaṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇato nyaset / śuklāṃ dhyāyet //
dheṃ heṃ bheṃ heṃ śriyaṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇato nyaset / śuklāṃ dhyāyet //
geṃ ḍeṃ veṃ śeṃ padmāntarataḥ puṣṭiṃ nyaset / śvetāṃ dhyāyet //
geṃ ḍeṃ veṃ śeṃ padma-antarataḥ puṣṭiṃ nyaset / śvetāṃ dhyāyet //
heṃ seṃ purato vanamālāṃ nyaset / heṃ seṃ bahuvarṇāṃ dhyāyet //
heṃ seṃ purato vana-mālāṃ nyaset / heṃ seṃ bahu-varṇāṃ dhyāyet //
oṃ ity āgneyyāṃ varma nyaset / bahuvarṇaṃ dhyāyet //
oṃ ity āgneyyāṃ varma nyaset / bahu-varṇaṃ dhyāyet //
oṃ jheṃ leṃ śrīvatsaṃ nyaset / śukl[a]ṃ dhyāyet //
oṃ jheṃ leṃ śrīvatsaṃ nyaset / śukl[a]ṃ dhyāyet //
oṃ cheṃ ṭheṃ vāyavye kaustubhaṃ nyaset / ādityaṃ dīptaṃ dhyāyet //
oṃ cheṃ ṭheṃ vāyavye kaustubhaṃ nyaset / ādityaṃ dīptaṃ dhyāyet //
tato maṇḍale bāhyasthāṃ yathāsvadiśam okāraukārau (?) dikpatī śakrāgnī yamanairṛtavāruṇapavanakuberān aiśānyāṃ nyaset / yathoktarūpaṃ dhyāyet //
tato maṇḍale bāhya-sthāṃ yathā-sva-diśam o-kārau-kārau (?) dik-patī śakra-agnī yama-nairṛta-vāruṇa-pavana-kuberān aiśānyāṃ nyaset / yatha-ukta-rūpaṃ dhyāyet //
oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāyety antena dvādaśākṣareṇa karṇikāmadhye puruṣāyārghyapādyācamanīyānulepanapuṣpadīpadhūpamadhuparkanaivedyaphalabhakṣyāṇi nivedayet //
oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya ity antena dvādaśa-akṣareṇa karṇikā-madhye puruṣāya arghya-pādya-ācamanīya-anulepana-puṣpa-dīpa-dhūpa-madhu-parka-naivedya-phala-bhakṣyāṇi nivedayet //
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyety athavāṣṭākṣareṇa mantreṇa / oṃ jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana / manas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja //
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya ity athava āṣṭa-akṣareṇa mantreṇa / oṃ jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśva-bhāvana / manas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa mahā-puruṣa pūrvaja //
ity anena mantreṇa puruṣasūktena vā / athānyān dalaniviṣṭān devān yathābhihitair mantraiḥ pṛthakpṛthag arcaye[t] //
ity anena mantreṇa puruṣa-sūktena vā / atha anyān dala-niviṣṭān devān yathā-abhihitair mantraiḥ pṛthak-pṛthag arcaye[t] //
kṛtvā vyādhiṃ vyā[dh]itaṃ bhakṣayati na karoti na tad āpnoti idaṃ tv anyat / dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ puṇyaṃ ca pavitraṃ pāpanāśanaṃ //
kṛtvā vyādhiṃ vyā[dh]itaṃ bhakṣayati na karoti na tad āpnoti idaṃ tv anyat / dhanyaṃ yaśasyaṃ puṇyaṃ ca pavitraṃ pāpa-nāśanaṃ //

ārogyaṃ dhanadhānyavardhanaṃ śatrughnaṃ vaśīkaraṇaṃ yaḥ puruṣo 'nena vidhinā satataṃ devam abhyarcayati saṃpattiṃ janayati athavā tasya na rocate tadā śvetadvīpam avpyāpya arkamaṇḍalaṃ bhittvā niruṇaddhi pradyumnasaṃkarṣaṇān prāpnoti sudevatvam avāpya niṣkalatvam āpnoti //

ārogyaṃ dhana-dhānya-vardhanaṃ śatrughnaṃ vaśī-karaṇaṃ yaḥ puruṣo 'nena vidhinā satataṃ devam abhyarcayati saṃpattiṃ janayati athavā tasya na rocate tadā śveta-dvīpam avpyāpya arka-maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā niruṇaddhi pradyumna-saṃkarṣaṇān prāpnoti sudeva-tvam avāpya niṣkala-tvam āpnoti //
// iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīya-khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeya-vajra-saṃvāde nārāyaṇa-pūjana-prakāra-varṇano nāma dvipañcāśaduttara-triśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 352 //
// iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīya-khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde nārada-prasādo nāma tripañcāśaduttaratriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 353 //
